PropertyOverride.Name: DistanceAlong
PropertyOverride.DisplayName: Avstand fra start=0 langs egen linje [m]

CustomProperty.Name: Derogation
CustomProperty.Description: The 'Derogation' enumeration property [ Overholder regelverk (NORMED) | Ikke iht regelverk (DEVIATING) | Fravikssøknad sendt (REQUESTED) | Dispensasjon innvilget (GRANTED) ] reflects the status of the entire object in relation to applicable rules and regulations. The Derogation property is initially NORMED, as long as all modelchecks result in 'Unfinished', 'OK' or 'Warning'. The Derogation property changes from NORMED to DEVIATING if one or more modelchecks result in 'Error'. If the user manages to modify the model and thereby remove the errors, then status changes backed to 'Normed'. Whenever the user instead chooses to file an application for derogation, the user is expected to manually change status to REQUESTED (using F4, not deleting the Lua formula). When a positive answer is received, the user is expected to change status to GRANTED. If instead a negative answer is received, the user is expected to change status manually back to DEVIATING and take new steps from there. Note: 'Derogation' is a regular property that can be set/reset by the user, even if it appears in the 'Model check' category in the Property Manager.

Value.Description: All modelchecks are showing either Unfinished, OK or Warning
One or more modelchecks show an Error, but no derogation has been requested or granted
One or more modelchecks show an Error, a derogation has been requested but not yet granted
One or more modelchecks show an Error, a derogation has been granted

CustomProperty.Name: Discipline
CustomProperty.Description: The custom 'Discipline' attribute [Felles | Skilt | Overbygning | Underbygning | Kontaktledning | Signal | Tele | Lavspent] identifies the discpline owning the object.

CustomProperty.Name: MileageIncreasesTowardsLeft
CustomProperty.Description: The 'MileageIncreasesTowardsLeft' property [boolean] shows whether the object's own alignment has mileage which increases towards the left in the drawing, with the UCS Y-axis pointing upwards. Usage: Used in DNA for orienting 2D symbols correctly of for adjusting left/right parts of texts etc.

CustomProperty.Description: The 'Var0' custom property [String] is a local variable for free use.

CustomProperty.Name: PortalMounted
CustomProperty.Description: The 'PortalMounted' boolean custom property defines whether the object (board, signal etc) has its own mast (default:false) or is suspended from a portal (true).

CustomProperty.Name: SpreadingLens
CustomProperty.Description: The 'SpreadingLens' custom property [Ja,-] defines whether the signal shall use spreading lenses (default: '-').

LuaExpression.Name: LateralOffset
LuaExpression.Formula: local d = getPropertyValue("LateralOffset") local sc = DocumentData.Document.Database.Cannoscale.Scale --Annotative scale if d == 0 then return (LeftSided and -1 or 1) * 6/sc else return RC__getNearestSnapDistance(d*sc,3)/sc end

LuaExpression.Name: VerticalOffset
LuaExpression.Formula: if PortalMounted then --Object, or the object it is attached to, has the PortalMounted custom attribute: return PortalMounted and 8.0 or 0 else if Variant:find("Baliseskilt") then return 0.30 --Typically located on platform side facing the track elseif Variant:find("75B") then return 2.75 --On tunnel wall elseif Variant:find("Rømningsavstand") then return 1.85 --Escape distance/directions. On tunnel wall. else return 0 end end
